posts.post_content:

2 selections from the Roy Mellinger Collection, which is dwindling down to the last 10 cards or so!

See this old thread for some interesting provenance! N54 thread re:    [url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=118774&highlight=t206[/url]
 

(1) T206 RUBE OLDRING-PHIL A’S P150/25 SGC 40 VG 3!

Here is a SUPERIOR EXAMPLE of RUBE OLDRING, outfielder for the PHILADELPHIA A'S.  VIRTUALLY SPOTLESS F & B, w/ LARGE PURE WHITE BORDERS & NICE SHARP CORNERS.  Features a very COLORFUL picture in FULL, CLEAR FOCUS w/ COLOR CONTRAST 2ND to NONE! A HIGH QUALITY T206, TO BE SURE![STRIKE] $49 DELIVERED
[/STRIKE] $44 DELIVERED!!

SOLD(2) T206 JIM PASTORIUS-BROOKLYN SC150/25 SGC 40 VG 3! 

Offering this AMAZINGLY FRESH, CRISP & CLEAN example of JIM PASTORIUS, pitcher for the Brooklyn Superbas (Dodgers). Sporting NICE WHITE BORDERS, SPOTLESS both F & B and a picture that is as SHARP & IN-FOCUS as any you will ever find! It has the Sweet Caporal 150 Factory 25 reverse w/ CORNERS SHARP & WELL-DEFINED. Definitely a HI-GRADE EYE APPEAL T206, to be sure! [STRIKE]$69 DELIVERED[/STRIKE]

(3) T206 AL SHAW-STL CARDINALS SWEETCAP 150/30 SGC 40 VG 3!

Here's an OUTSTANDING EXAMPLE of AL SHAW, outfielder for the ST LOUIS CARDINALS. EYE APPEAL is 2nd to NONE, for sure! LARGE PURE WHITE BORDERS & NICE SQUARED CORNERS are evident, along w/ a BEAUTIFULLY COLORFUL picture in FULL, CLEAR FOCUS. SPOTLESS F & B--AN OVERALL WONDERFUL T206! [STRIKE]$49 DELIVERED
[/STRIKE] $44 DELIVERED
Thanks for looking--These are 3 Classy, Well Preserved T206's w/ a COOL Minor League provenance.
KILLIAN HAS BEEN SOLD, the other 2 are available.
